channel.title: Message to all when npc is dead
channel.description:
Is there a code to put in NPCHandler that says something to everyone like yell? I tried:
[code] PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"Message Here";[/code]
It got errors. So anyhelp?

item.title: Message to all when npc is dead
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Ah, thanks =]

I knew I had to do something with ppl cuz of the surrounding ppls, but thanks again mad

Read full topic
item.source: Message to all when npc is dead

item.title: Message to all when npc is dead
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

ppl.teleportToX = 3248; ppl.teleportToY = 9364; ppl.heightLevel = 0; ppl.sendMessage("Good Job! You have slain jad for the fire cape!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ppl.playerName+"Message Here"; ppl.addItem(6570, 1);

put ppl infront of playerName like iâ€™ve put.

Read full topic
item.source: Message to all when npc is dead

item.title: Message to all when npc is dead
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Error:

NPCHandler.java:1285: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerName location: class NPCHandler PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"Message Here"; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Where the code is:

ppl.teleportToX = 3248; ppl.teleportToY = 9364; ppl.heightLevel = 0; ppl.sendMessage("Good Job! You have slain jad for the fire cape!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"Message Here"; ppl.addItem(6570, 1);

Read full topic
